title: Promoting Climate Smart Agricultural Initiatives in Cambodia

tasks.task: Support infrastructure rehabilitation and climate-proofing in rice-producing provinces
Demonstrate and promote laser land levelling techniques
Pilot test weather-indexed crop insurance scheme
Develop and enforce rice seed certification system
Enhance job opportunities for women in rice farming
